title: 'No long lasting'
body: 'Smell is not long lasting..not even stay for 1 minute.. very disappointed'

title: My favourite, and my wife's too.
body: 'I love this unique scent the most. Very fascinating mix of amber sandal and musk. My wife loves it too (hehe).'

title: Men's Deodorant
body: 'Product quality is OK.. Price so high...'

title: 'Used product delivered with Fogg spray cap'
body: 'Used product is delivered. There is no seal on the bottle. The cap is not of Yardly. It is Fogg spray cap.'

title: 'Useless product without any fragrance'
body: 'No fragrance whatsoever. One feel like spraying air under your armpits. It is a useless product waste of money.'

title: 'Smells good as the product looks'
body: I have received this product in open and used condition because it was not in full contant in volume ( quantity) before sending goods to customer Amazon should check that product is New product or packed well, fresh in condition, they are not taking care they are seeing that PRODUCT IS SENT TO CUSTOMER AND REQUIRED GOOD REVIEW. buss that' all.

title: 'Gas issues'
body: 'The container have only gas more than 70%'

title: 'Professional office wear.'
body: 'Smells like a gentleman and best suited for corporate workers. Stays long and great price. Easy buy. Go for it!'

title: 'Super and nice fragrance'
body: 'Smell is awesome and lasting body spray.. really like this product'

title: 'Filled with the smell of flowers'
body: 'Filled with the smell of flowers. No Gas. Very good product. Also good packing.'

title: 'Smell give you headache'
body: Really very bad smell. Don't buy..

title: 'When i got dilivered cap was open'
body: When i got dilivered cap was open it seems like someone used it ... Please seal the cap with cello tape and dilivered it... Overall it's good

title: 'Worth it'
body: 'Classy fragrance! I gifted it to my friend and he loved it ‚ù§Ô∏è and his friends too loved it üòç and they ordered it too.'

title: 'Yardley deo'
body: 'It is very nice to product and its smell is geljorics thanks'

title: 'Feels like a classic'
body: The scent of this perfume is somewhere between high and mid still it doesn't create an uneasiness in your nose. Moreover it doesn't fade away soon and remains for a long time. Also the best thing about this is the scent, the way it smells is awesome, feels like a classic gentleman retro.

title: Gentleman's fragrance
body: 'It has very smooth decent fragrance go for it if you like fresh and light scent'

title: 'Disheartening'
body: 'Neither fragrance is strong enough nor it last for long.'

title: 'Feels like an used one'
body: The bottle doesn't feel full, it looks new but feels like someone has used it already

title: 'A good deodorant'
body: 'There is nothing special to mention here . The nozzle is not of a deodorant it is of perfume and scent . The nozzle needs to be pressed again and again and flawless flow with one press is missing . The packing is pretty ordinary and scent longevity is completely missing'

title: 'Little strong sweet and tangy'
body: 'Gold is sweet smell. Less strong but black is little strong best for summer.. overall value for money. 200ml = 127 rs'

title: 'amazing experience with this Yardley.'
body: 'very good fragrance. Yardley from wipro company. most recommended. thank you Amazon India.'
